creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: red clay vessel decorated in cream and red; C-shaped handle from duck's head to back, with a spout at center
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [4/91335]; on bottom, on sticker: [I6I/794]
object_name: Vessel in the form of a Duck
text: In the high desert of Peru water is very scarce. These ceramics, although made of porous earthenware, are slip coated and highly burnished to reduce loss of water due to evaporation. The spouts on the stirrup handles would also have been stoppered.
title: Vessel in the form of a Duck
